ctx: intros A B f l1 l2 H.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type B : Type f : A -> B l1, l2 : list A H : permutation l1 l2 Unable to unify "(fix In (a : ?M1435) (l : list ?M1435) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => False | b :: m => b = a \\/ In a m end) (?M1436 ?M1438) (map ?M1436 ?M1437)" with "permutation (map f l1) (map f l2)".

original: intros A B f l1 l2 H. unfold permutation in H |-*. intros. apply in_map_iff in H0. destruct H0 as [x [H1 H2]]. apply in_map_iff. exists x. split. + apply in_map with (f:=f) in H1. rewrite map_map in H1. apply in_map_iff in H1. destruct H1 as [y [H3 H4]]. rewrite <- H3 in H2. apply in_map_iff. exists y. auto. + apply in_map. auto.
